segments.text: Hello , this is Than Hua's office . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , could I speak to the export manager , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is Joey from Mary trading company . I learned that you are the leading export of cloth by Hummed company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are interested in cloth made in China . The clothes are sold very well here . We are a big location supplier for the northeast market here . I'm thinking that we'll have some business opportunities .
segments.speaker: S2
